version_description:
We've fixed some annoying glitches and bugs: 
- If you're in the middle of reading an article and close the app, it'll return the place in the article at point of closing when you open it next time. 
- The app 'refreshes' on each open to check for any new issues or changes to articles. This 'refresh' was causing problems in returning to the homescreen unintentionally, and breaking the sidebar menu. This has been fixed. 
- Some older devices were crashing on certain articles - this has now been fixed. 
- On the issue menu screen, the lowest dropdown (Careers) was being cut off on certain devices. This has now been fixed.
